column5: It's been a tough spring in some rivers especially the Credit.  I have learned that downsizing everything, float, leader, hook size, and roe bags definitely pays off.  I landed my personal best last week on a 4 lb test leader.  Here are some highlight pics from the last few weeks.
Some real tanks in there.  Looks like a great season!
Some very nice spring steel man !!! Well done
Great spring steel man.  Ya did quite alright.  Congrats on the PB
Looks like a pretty awesome spring to me!!

Congrads on the PB, considerable numbers of fish still on Redds last Sunday, seen at least 20 pairs in the upper Ganny, but the dropbacks were in the deep runs and holes, and were more then willing to chew on flies, and flatfish.
Very nice.  I hear ya about down sizing.  My PB steely was almost 11lbs, caught on a size 10 hook.  Ven
